info.name: Conference Room Booking API (mock)
info.description:
API for managing conference rooms, bookings, and availability within an office environment.

Contact Support:  
Name: Support Team  
Email: [support@company.com](https://mailto:support@company.com)

item.name: Check available rooms for a given time slot

exec: // Request-specific tests for "Check available rooms for a given time slot"
try { json = pm.response.json(); } catch (e) { json = null; }
// 200 OK: body has rooms-like structure or is array
pm.test('200: response contains rooms-like data', function () {
pm.expect(isArray || hasRoomsProp, 'Expected an array or a rooms-like property').to.be.true;
pm.test('400: error structure present with message or error field', function () {
const hasMessage = json && (typeof json.message === 'string' || (json.error && typeof json.error === 'string'));
pm.expect(hasMessage || hasErrorsArr, 'Expected message/error or errors[] in body').to.be.true;
